Articles.Content: hi everyone first off i want to say im sorry for any spelling mitakes or if i put this in the wrong place,,, im looking for a mod or if somone is up to the task on making this it would be great  to,,,,, when i land my ship on the home planet, i would like to have an option to save and re use any cargo i bring down , you see   ive got antimatter fuel staions around kerbal and ive started making hydogen antimatter and if anyof you know this is really expensive fuel,, so i would really like this option where i can store it and re use it on a later launches or missions, now im sure some would say well just go up and refuel your ship,,ya i could but no....i want to save my fuel or anything,,, i dont know just havin an option where everything is sold ,,,,,  a little tab you can open to save stuff,,, if thers alredy a mod out ther like that then im sorry for all this but i cant find it ,,, god bless and happy flyin

15 hours ago, mrgreco said:

 im sorry for any spelling mitakes or if i put this in the wrong place,,, 

No problem. We have moved your question to the modding subforum, though, since you're asking for mods. Good luck.

Maybe use SimpleLogistics! (SLOG!)

  • Park a tank drone near the landing zone (and set it up)
    • Tanks(s) 
    • Drone Core
    • Energy storage and production (which can be in another drone)
  • Dump the excess through SimpleLogistics! from the ship to be recovered
  • When you launch a new vessel
    • launch it empty
    • use SimpleLogistics! to fuel it for take off/launch.

Wiki

 

Edited March 21, 2022 by zer0Kerbal
